unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Cracking the Follower Code!**
normalised: **social media and influencer marketing cracking the follower code!**

unnormalised: Hey fam! Are your Instagram reels just not hitting the mark like you hoped? Maybe your YouTube views are flatter than a dosa? Don't despair, it's time to dive into follower analytics!
normalised: hey fam! are your instagram reels just not hitting the mark like you hoped? maybe your youtube views are flatter than a dosa? don't despair, it's time to dive into follower analytics!

unnormalised: Think of it like this: you wouldn't make biryani without knowing your spices, right? Same with social media! Follower analytics are your secret spice blend to understand who's watching, what they like, and why they're hitting that follow/unfollow button.
normalised: think of it like this: you wouldn't make biryani without knowing your spices, right? same with social media! follower analytics are your secret spice blend to understand who's watching, what they like, and why they're hitting that follow or unfollow button.

unnormalised: Tools are popping up everywhere, giving you insights into everything from demographic breakdowns (is it mostly Chennai or Chandigarh?) to the best time to post for maximum engagement (forget 9-to-5, maybe midnight is your golden hour!).
normalised: tools are popping up everywhere, giving you insights into everything from demographic breakdowns (is it mostly chennai or chandigarh?) to the best time to post for maximum engagement (forget nine to five, maybe midnight is your golden hour!).

unnormalised: Heard that Priya from Delhi increased her engagement by 30% just by tweaking her posting schedule? Analytics, baby! Many businesses even use this data to understand the ROI on their influencer spends - are those expensive collaborations actually bringing in the Rs. or just pretty pictures?
normalised: heard that priya from delhi increased her engagement by thirty percent just by tweaking her posting schedule? analytics, baby! many businesses even use this data to understand the R O I on their influencer spends - are those expensive collaborations actually bringing in the rupees or just pretty pictures?

unnormalised: So, ditch the guesswork this Diwali. Get analyzing! Your audience is talking (or clicking!), are you listening?
normalised: so, ditch the guesswork this diwali. get analyzing! your audience is talking (or clicking!), are you listening?
